metadata.title: CVE-2023-26116 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Versions of the package angular from 1.2.21 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the angular.copy() utility function due to the usage of an insecure regular expression. Exploiting this vulnerability is possible by a large carefully-crafted input, which can result in catastrophic backtracking.

notes.note: mdeslaur> There is no upstream fix for this issue as of 2023-05-15

criterions.comment: angular.js package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-05-15').
